name: NSImageView
desc: A display of image data from an NSImage object in a frame.

items.name: class NSImageCell
items.desc: An NSImageCell object displays a single image (encapsulated in an NSImage object) in a frame. This class provides methods for choosing the frame and for aligning and scaling the image to fit the frame.

items.name: var image: NSImage?
items.desc: The image displayed by the image view.

items.name: var imageFrameStyle: NSImageView.FrameStyle
items.desc: The style of frame that appears around the image.

items.name: var imageAlignment: NSImageAlignment
items.desc: The alignment of the cell’s image inside the image view.

items.name: var imageScaling: NSImageScaling
items.desc: The scaling mode applied to make the cell’s image fit the frame of the image view.

items.name: var animates: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the image view automatically plays animated images.

items.name: var isEditable: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the user can drag a new image into the image view.

items.name: var allowsCutCopyPaste: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the image view lets the user cut, copy, and paste the image contents.
